name: Criminal Murder - LA Case
description:
Criminal Murder - LA Case is a simple yet highly addictive spot the difference game.
The game is very simple, you will need to find the differences between the two pictures in order to solve the case and continue on the next level.

A must-have for all Spot the difference lovers!

Features:
- 47 playable scenes
- Hints and boosters will help you to find all the evidences.
- iPad, iPhone6 and iPhone 6 Plus Support!
- iOS 8 support


Have fun solving the murder cases.
